item.description:
On the second Saturday of every month Loving Hut holds a $10 all-you-can-eat buffet fundraiser for VegWorcester. The next one is coming on up May 14. 10% is donated to VegWorcester

Come eat a ton of mock meats, spring rolls, crab rangoons, lo mien, coconut curry soup. All vegan, all tasty. 

Interested in getting involved with future VegWorcester events like VegFest? Join us at the big table in the middle from 12pm-1:30pm! We've been brainstorming some ways to continue making an impact in Worcester and are hoping to expand. We have a lot of great leafleting opportunities, school outreach programs, demonstrations, potlucks, vegan feed-ins and important activism campaigns in the works- We want your help!
item.name: Loving Hut Vegan Buffet tomorrow!!
